snippet: Adam Searl, 20, a walk-on punter for No. 20 U.C.L.A., has been arrested in a rape investigation, the Los Angeles police and university officials said.
abstract: University of California, Los Angeles, punter Adam Searl is arrested in rape investigation stemming from charges that he had sexually assaulted woman in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Adam Searl, 20, a walk-on punter for No. 20 U.C.L.A., has been arrested in a rape investigation, the Los Angeles police and university officials said.

headline.print_headline: U.C.L.A. Player Arrested in Rape Case
headline.main: U.C.L.A. Player Arrested in Rape Case
